ComicInfo.Summary:
After her adventures with the Danger Doll Squad, it’s time for Katie to get back to her life at the comic shop. But when your day-to-day activities include battling nasty other-dimensional vampiric parasites hellbent on revenge, life is tough!
This issues also features 3 covers (regular, artist, and 90s style), each with a risqué variant!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Zoe Stanley | 3 | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Zoe Stanley | 4 | E | 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | David Harrigan | 5 | F | Risqué 90's Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | David Harrigan | 6 | Note: Overall issue #22.
